title: QC Analyst (Chemistry)
full_description: Quality Control Analyst - ChemistryFerndale, MIContract-to-Hire OpportunityMonday-Friday, 6AM-2:30PMKelly Science & Clinical has an excellent opportunity for someone with a scientific degree, looking to gain more experience! This is a great fit for someone with previous instrumentation experience that is looking to grow long-term in a close-knit, team-oriented environment.Responsibilities Quality control analysis of the products and raw materials and special inter-department projects as needed. + Analyze, approve /reject, and adjust products and raw materials based on corporate Q.C. specifications. + Use Lotus Notes for Q.C. specs and procedure information. + Calculate product adjustments and communicate to Manufacturing. Use of all laboratory equipment and instruments, such as pH meters, AA, HPLC, UV, ICP, etc. + Communicate lab inventory needs to Supervisor. + Communicate with Manufacturing and Purchasing to maintain high standards of Quality for raw materials and raw material sources. + Maintain records of test results and enter into SAP data management system. + Log and store retain samples in proper locations. + Maintain general lab safety and awareness. + Perform general lab housekeeping. Properly store and dispose of all lab chemicals. + Analyze NCMR (F8/F9) samples and provide dispositions for them. All lab duties are performed in accordance with ISO 9001 and 14001 standards.Qualifications Bachelor's degree in the sciences required , chemistry degree preferred + Experience with instrumentation such as pH meters, HPLC, UV-Vis, etc. required + 1-2 years of industry experience preferred + Quality-minded with strong attention to detailWhy Kelly **** ?Kelly Science & Clinical is your connection to premier scientific and clinical companies looking to hire talented people just like you.
